newsitem.title: JAPAN: Taito Co shares surge in morning trade.
newsitem.headline: Taito Co shares surge in morning trade.

text.p: Shares of Taito Co Ltd rose sharply in Thursday morning trade, supported by speculation about the firm's development of drugs to assist organ transplants, traders said.
As of 0148 GMT, the share was up 66 yen at 681 yen, the largest percentage gain on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Volume was 394,000 shares.
Company officials said that although they have been developing a new drug over the past few years, there have not been any new developments.
Taito is mainly a sugar refiner affiliated with trading house Mitsui and Co, but it is also involved in producing pharmaceuticals.
